Attributs protégés
$barcode_array = array()
$last_enc = ENC_ASCII
$symbattr
$chset_id = array(ENC_C40 => 'C40', ENC_TXT => 'TXT', ENC_X12 =>'X12')
$chset
Description détaillée
Class to create DataMatrix ECC 200 barcode arrays for TCPDF class. DataMatrix (ISO/IEC 16022:2006) is a 2-dimensional bar code.

getErrorCorrection() getErrorCorrectionDatamatrix DatamatrixgetErrorCorrection
getErrorCorrection ( $wd, $nb, $nd, $nc, $gf = 256 , $pp = 301 )[protected]
Add error correction codewords to data codewords array (ANNEX E).
Paramètres
array$wd
Array of datacodewords.
int$nb
Number of blocks.
int$nd
Number of data codewords per block.
int$nc
Number of correction codewords per block.
int$gf
numner of fields on log/antilog table (power of 2).
int$pp
The value of its prime modulus polynomial (301 for ECC200).
Renvoie
array data codewords + error codewords

second number to multiply.
